mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(id) FROM GACHA_WISH WHERE user_id = #{userId}

SELECT G.id AS gacha_id , G.status , G.title , G.manufacturer , G.file_id , (SELECT file_url FROM IMAGE_FILE WHERE file_id = G.file_id ORDER BY created_at ASC LIMIT 1) AS file_url , G.price , G.view_count , (SELECT COUNT(id) FROM GACHA_WISH WHERE gacha_id = G.id) AS wish_count , NULL AS total_pick_count , (SELECT COUNT(id) FROM TRADE_COMPLETE_HISTORY WHERE gacha_id = G.id) AS trade_count , G.created_at , G.updated_at FROM GACHA G INNER JOIN GACHA_WISH GW ON GW.gacha_id = G.id WHERE GW.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY GW.created_at DESC LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{offset}
